system.notes: The Only Armour adopted into service since the end of the Horus Heresy up until the opening of the Great Rift. +5 to Command, whenever an attack hits the head, roll 1d10, on an 8+ it hits the body instead. +20 Strength. Subsystems: Autosenses (+10), Osmotic Sustainer, Pain Suppressant (6), Vox Link, Magnetised Boots, Nutrient Recycling (2 Weeks), Recoil Suppression. -10 Manual Dexterity Mod. Roll on Power Armour History once. 20 minutes to don/doff unaided, 5 mins aided, Half action to remove helmet. Increases Size to Hulking.
